Bash("c:/laragon/www/kuilinga-backend/venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, ''c:/laragon/www/kuilinga-backend''\)
from app.db.session import SessionLocal
from app.crud.user import user
from app.core.security import get_password_hash

db = SessionLocal\(\)
u = user.get_by_email\(db, email=''admin@kuilinga.com''\)
if u:
    new_hash = get_password_hash\(''admin123''\)
    u.hashed_password = new_hash
    db.commit\(\)
    print\(''Password reset to admin123''\)
    # Verify it works now
    from app.core.security import verify_password
    db.refresh\(u\)
    print\(''Verification:'', verify_password\(''admin123'', u.hashed_password\)\)
else:
    print\(''User not found''\)
db.close\(\)
")
